name: webverse
description: Webverse is the collaborative canvas to annotate the web. Draw together in real time. Public, private, and shared spaces.

scripts.build: npm run type-check && npm run clean && cross-env BUILD_TARGET=vue vite build --mode dev && cross-env BUILD_TARGET=content vite build --mode dev && cross-env BUILD_TARGET=background vite build --mode dev
scripts.build:prod: npm run type-check && npm run clean && cross-env BUILD_TARGET=vue vite build --mode prod && cross-env BUILD_TARGET=content vite build --mode prod && cross-env BUILD_TARGET=background vite build --mode prod
